snippet: Linn State Technical College is the first public college in the country to institute a mandatory drug test, according to the A.C.LU., which sued and has won a temporary injunction.
lead_paragraph: Linn State Technical College is the first public college in the country to institute a mandatory drug test, according to the A.C.LU., which sued and has won a temporary injunction.

headline.main: At One College, a Fight Over Required Drug Tests
headline.print_headline: At One College, a Fight Over Required Drug Tests
headline.seo: At Linn State Technical, a Fight Over Required Drug Tests
